tool_description: Detect sensitive information inside images, PDFs or raw text, and redact it, for safe upload.
name: Redactor Detector
title: Redactor Detector

api_list.name: Upload and extract from PDF
api_list.description:
Extract all the text inside PDF documents. Use the Redact PDF method to pass in keywords you want highlighted or redacted.
This is an asynchronous operation, so you may have to wait in between calls to the different methods.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/detectpdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/detectpdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Redact PDF Document
api_list.description: Redact or highlight passed in keywords inside a previously uploaded PDF document.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/getpdf"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Redact only user keywords
api_list.description: Detect and redact only the provided keywords by the user. This can be useful in cases where you want to redact names or information only the user knows about, and doesn't want to deal with the multiple parameters in the redact all API call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/userkeywords"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Redact all with URL
api_list.description: Pass an image URL, and redact all sensitive information in the image.
api_list.code:

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/redacturl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Blur Faces
api_list.description: Blur unwanted faces from an image. This can be tuned for blurring minors from images, for example.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/blurfaces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Redact Raw Text
api_list.description: Pass in a string of text, for it to be checked and redacted.
api_list.code:

url = "https://redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com/redacttext"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "redactor-detector.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
